title: Synthesis of nicotinimidamides via a tandem CuAAC/ring-cleavage /cyclization/oxidation four-component reaction and their cytotoxicity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25844-25851
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04918G, Paper

Xi Chen, Guanrong Li, Zixin Huang, Qiaoli Luo, Tao Chen, Weiguang Yang
An efficient tandem CuAAC/ring-cleavage/cyclization/oxidation four-component reaction for the synthesis of nicotinimidamides, and the cytotoxicity of nicotinimidamide was also tested.
